mapper.select: select * from tbl_board where boardnum = 3 order by b_number desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board(boardnum,b_number,writer,auth, password, subject, content) values(#{boardnum},SEQ_TBL_BOARD.nextval,#{writer},#{auth},#{password},#{subject},#{content})
mapper.update: update tbl_board set subject=#{subject}, reg_date = sysdate where b_number = #{b_number}
